name: XWUI Stack Component
description: Stack layout component (vertical flex with spacing). Provides consistent spacing between stacked items. Supports row and column directions, alignment, justification, wrapping, and spacing/gap. Useful for vertical layouts with consistent spacing.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

spacing.description: Spacing between stacked items (string or number)

gap.description: Gap between items (alias for spacing, string or number)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the stack container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of items (strings or HTMLElements) to display in the stack
